text: Michael Grant "Iron Mike" Marshall (January 15, 1943 â€“ May 31, 2021) was an American professional baseball pitcher. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) in 1967 and from 1969 through 1981 for nine different teams. Marshall died under hospice care in Zephyrhills, Florida on May 31, 2021, at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Milwaukee Brewers players Category:Houston Astros players Category:Montreal Expos players Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Atlanta Braves players Category:Texas Rangers players Category:Minnesota Twins players Category:New York Mets players Category:Sportspeople from Michigan
title: Mike Marshall (pitcher)
